DataElement.preferredName: Past 12 Month Alcoholic Beverage Use Alcohol Consumption Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the average number, in the past 12 months, how many alcoholic beverages a person had per day.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Before the present time._A number with no fractional part.::12_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient. Alcoholic beverage is a known human carcinogen.__Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part.::12:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient. Alcoholic beverage is a known human carcinogen.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient.

Property.preferredDefinition: Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The average number of alcoholic drinks consumed by the participant.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A symbol or string of symbols expressing value, quantity, or identification. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.name: In the past 12 months, on tho
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 12 months, on those days that you drank alcoholic beverages, on average, how many drinks did you have per day?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: Enter a whole number (i.e. "4") only. Do not enter a range or fraction.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Enter the average number of drinks per day

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-2
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 12 months, on those days that you drank alcoholic beverages, on average, how many drinks did you have per day?   (Enter the average number of drinks per day.)
